OOC: It's April 3rd, a day that seems ordinary to most of you, but not for 
me.  Today was the day, 1 year ago, that i joined this RPG.  I had been doing 
searches all over the internet for RPGs, but none really caught my eye until 
i saw the link- Neo Beast Wars RPG. I decided id like to check it out, and 
fell in love as soon as i read the story and looked at the characters.  I 
knew i must join immeadiately, so i used an old favorite character, Torca.  
My profile was an immeadiate mode, and i was pretty stupid when i was new.  I 
remember my first post like it was yesterday.  Torca burst into the Predacon 
base and put his gun up to Quickstrike and tried to eliminate his spark.  
Talon got really pissed at me.  But soon i started to catch on, and created 
stronger characters and some good stories.  In my time here in the RPG, i saw 
many changes.  I've seen ultra-powerful groups rise and fall, extremely 
talented RPers come and go(not to mention a lot of idiots), and built 
firendships with members.  Id like to thank Soulstice for his friendship and 
partnership, Zardus for putting up with me through my early times, and 
everyone else that ive had the pleasure(or displeasure) of RPing with, and i 
hope my next year here will be even better.  Just wanted to get that off my 
chest.

--part1_66.d8c506b.27fba34f_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
